Sanctum Reminder AFS
Reminder Reminder
1 Before the game starts, place your sanctum here face down. This is not an ordered deck. You can look at your sanctum at any time. Your sanctum consists of up to seven basics lands and unique nonlands that can start in the sanctum. You may sideboard to add or remove cards from your sanctum as long as they are all unique or are basic lands. 1
